channel.title: Changing Client background ( Not in Sprites ) REWARD!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, i need help to change the background image to the normal runescape image, i have tried but i dont know how. Its not in sprites... Below are images of what i have atm, and what i want, there is a reward for the person who helps me, jump on teamviewer my id is 775 424 835 and pass : 1198..
[img]http://i1090.photobucket.com/albums/i366/Nexscape3859/73.png[/img]
This is what i want it too look like...
[img]http://i1090.photobucket.com/albums/i366/Nexscape3859/75.png[/img]
PLEASE HELP!!!

item.title: Changing Client background ( Not in Sprites ) REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“saadmboy, post:5, topic:405839”]I’ve done it about 3 months ago…I may have have missed a part or told you the wrong place to look for background file but you’ll eventually figure it out

  1. download tom’s cache suite.
  2. open it and on top click load cache.
  3. select the wilderness reloaded cache
  4. wait…like 1 min.
  5. click edit media/images
  6. select title
  7. browse the files (like 8-10 files i think)
  8. export the old background file
  9. import the new vack ground file.
    Hope I helped…[/quote]

So … what I said?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Client background ( Not in Sprites ) REWARD!

item.title: Changing Client background ( Not in Sprites ) REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

I’ve done it about 3 months ago…I may have have missed a part or told you the wrong place to look for background file but you’ll eventually figure it out

  1. download tom’s cache suite.
  2. open it and on top click load cache.
  3. select the wilderness reloaded cache
  4. wait…like 1 min.
  5. click edit media/images
  6. select title
  7. browse the files (like 8-10 files i think)
  8. export the old background file
  9. import the new vack ground file.
    Hope I helped…

Read full topic
